title: pAlaya mAm
sahitya:
pAlayamAm paramEshvara shankara shaila sutAvara shashidhara shEkhara


anupallavi

  nIla kandara hara pAlita munivara pAla lOcana kAlakAlahatri purahara


caraNam    parama krpAkara durita vidUra caraNa janAdhAra shambarAri hara 
vAraNa carmAmbarAmara jAnhavIdhara parama puruSa vAsudEva dhrtAkara
